register.description: CORE module clock selection.

bitfield.description: Selects L4 interconnect clock (L4_CLK)

bitenum.description: L4_CLK is L3_CLK divided by 1
L4_CLK is L3_CLK divided by 2, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

bitfield.description: Selects L3 interconnect clock (L3_CLK)

bitenum.description: L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 1
L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 2, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

register.description: ABE module clock selection.

bitfield.description: Gating control for SLIMBUS_CLK clock tree in ABE.

bitenum.description: The clock is gated
The clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Gating control for PAD_CLKS clock tree in ABE

bitenum.description: The clock is gated
The clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Selects the OPP divider ABE domain

bitenum.description: ABE_CLK is divide by 1 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK, to be used for OPP_NOM
ABE_CLK is divide by 2 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK, to be used for OPP_LOW
ABE_CLK is divide by 4 of DPLL_ABE_X2_CLK

register.description: Special register for DLL control

bitfield.description: Control if DLL lock and code outputs are overriden or not

bitenum.description: Lock and code outputs are not overriden
Lock output is overriden to '1' and code output is overriden with a value coming from control module.

register.description: This register allows controlling the DPLL modes.

bitfield.description: Control if only low frequency spread is required

bitenum.description: When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread on both sides of the programmed frequency
When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread only on the lower side of the programmed frequency

bitfield.description: Acknowledgement from the DPLL regarding start and stop of Spread Spectrum Clocking feature

bitenum.description: SSC has been turned off on PLL o/ps
SSC has been turned on on PLL o/ps

bitfield.description: Enable or disable Spread Spectrum Clocking

bitenum.description: SSC disabled
SSC enabled

bitfield.description: Enable the REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL.

bitenum.description: REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL is disabled

bitfield.description: Set the DPLL in Low Power mode. Check the DPLL documentation to see when this can be enabled.

bitenum.description: Low power mode of the DPLL is disabled
Low power mode of the DPLL is enabled

bitfield.description: This bit allows to enable or disable the automatic recalibration feature of the DPLL. The DPLL will automatically start a recalibration process upon assertion of the DPLL's RECAL flag if this bit is set.

bitenum.description: DRIFTGUARD feature is disabled
DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL control

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Low Power mode.
Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in Lock mode

register.description: This register allows monitoring DPLL activity. This register is read only and automatically updated. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DPLL init status (for debug purpose)

bitenum.description: DPLL has been init
DPLL is not init

bitfield.description: DPLL mode status (for debug purpose)

bitenum.description: Transient state. From reset to any LP (low power) idle state or from any power state to any power state (Power states are Low Power Stop mode, Fast Relock Stop mode, Idle Bypass Low Power mode and Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode).
The DPLL is in Low Power Stop mode
The DPLL is in Fast Relock Stop mode
The DPLL is in Idle Bypass Low Power mode
The DPLL is in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode

bitfield.description: DPLL lock status

bitenum.description: DPLL is LOCKED
DPLL is either in bypass mode or in stop mode.

register.description: This register provides automatic control over the DPLL activity.

bitfield.description: DPLL automatic control.

bitenum.description: DPLL auto control disabled
The DPLL is automatically put in Low Power Stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Fast Relock Stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Idle Bypass Low Power mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: Allows control of the BYPASS clock of the PLL and the associated HSDIVIDER. In DPLL Locked mode: 0 - No impact; 1 - No impact In DPLL Bypass mode: 0x0 - CLKINP is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2 0x1 - CLKINPULOW is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2
Duty-cycle corrector for high frequency clock read 0x0: Duty-cycle corrector is disabled
Selects the source of the DPLL CLKOUTHIF clock.

bitenum.description: CLKOUTHIF is generated from the DPLL oscillator (DCO)
CLKOUTHIF is generated from CLKINPHIF

bitfield.description: DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). Equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M. [warm reset insensitive]
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1). [warm reset insensitive]

register.description: This register provides controls over the M2 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUT status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL post-divider factor, M2, for internal clock generation (1 to 31); Divide value from 1 to 31.

bitenum.description: 2, to be used for OPP_NOM
4, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the M3 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUTHIF status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL M3 post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 5, to be used for OPP_NOM
8, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT1 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT1 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H11+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 8, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT2 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT2 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H12+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 4, to be used for OPP_NOM
8, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT3 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT3 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H13+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 62, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT4 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT4 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H14+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63). When a value of 63 is programmed in this register, HSdivider will perform division by 2.5 that is divided by 2 at top level

register.description: Control the DeltaMStep parameter for Spread Spectrum Clocking. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DeltaMStep is split into fractional and integer part. For Triangular Spread Spectrum: [19:18] for integer part, [17:0] for fractional part For Square Wave Spread Spectrum [19:14] for integer part, [13:0] for fractional part

register.description: Control the Modulation Frequency (Fm) for Spread Spectrum. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Set the Exponent component of MODFREQDIV factor
Set the Mantissa component of MODFREQDIV factor

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT2 o/p of the HSDIVIDER2

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER2 CLKOUT2 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H22+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 5, to be used for OPP_NOM
10, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT3 o/p of the HSDIVIDER2

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER2 CLKOUT3 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H23+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 7, to be used for OPP_NOM
14, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT4 o/p of the 2nd HSDIVIDER.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER2 CLKOUT4 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is enabled
The clock output is gated

bitfield.description: DPLL (H24+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

register.description: This register allows controlling the DPLL modes.

bitfield.description: Control if only low frequency spread is required

bitenum.description: When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread on both sides of the programmed frequency
When SSC is enabled, clock frequency is spread only on the lower side of the programmed frequency

bitfield.description: Acknowledgement from the DPLL regarding start and stop of Spread Spectrum Clocking feature

bitenum.description: SSC has been turned off on PLL o/ps
SSC has been turned on on PLL o/ps

bitfield.description: Enable or disable Spread Spectrum Clocking

bitenum.description: SSC disabled
SSC enabled

bitfield.description: Enable the REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL.

bitenum.description: REGM4XEN mode of the DPLL is disabled

bitfield.description: Set the DPLL in Low Power mode. Check the DPLL documentation to see when this can be enabled.

bitenum.description: Low power mode of the DPLL is disabled
Low power mode of the DPLL is enabled

bitfield.description: This bit allows to enable or disable the automatic recalibration feature of the DPLL. The DPLL will automatically start a recalibration process upon assertion of the DPLL's RECAL flag if this bit is set.

bitenum.description: DRIFTGUARD feature is disabled
DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL control

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Low Power mode.
Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in Lock mode

register.description: This register allows monitoring DPLL activity. This register is read only and automatically updated. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DPLL init status (for debug purpose)

bitenum.description: DPLL has been init
DPLL is not init

bitfield.description: DPLL mode status (for debug purpose)

bitenum.description: Transient state. From reset to any LP (low power) idle state or from any power state to any power state (Power states are Low Power Stop mode, Fast Relock Stop mode, Idle Bypass Low Power mode and Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode).
The DPLL is in Low Power Stop mode.
The DPLL is in Fast Relock Stop mode.
The DPLL is in Idle Bypass Low Power mode.
The DPLL is in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode

bitfield.description: DPLL lock status

bitenum.description: DPLL is LOCKED
DPLL is either in bypass mode or in stop mode.

register.description: This register provides automatic control over the DPLL activity.

bitfield.description: DPLL automatic control;

bitenum.description: DPLL auto control disabled
The DPLL is automatically put in Low Power Stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Fast Relock Stop mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Idle Bypass Low Power mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.
The DPLL is automatically put in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode when its DPLL generated clocks are not required anymore. It is also restarted automatically.

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: Only CLKINPULOW bypass clock supported for this PLL
Duty-cycle corrector for high frequency clock 0x0: Duty-cycle corrector is disabled 0x1: Duty-cycle corrector is enabled
DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047) Equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M. [warm reset insensitive]
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1). [warm reset insensitive]

register.description: This register provides controls over the M2 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUT status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL M2 post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 1, to be used for OPP_NOM, OPP_HIGH and OPP_SPEEDBIN
2, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: Control the DeltaMStep parameter for Spread Spectrum Clocking. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DeltaMStep is split into fractional and integer part. For Triangular Spread Spectrum: [19:18] for integer part, [17:0] for fractional part For Square Wave Spread Spectrum [19:14] for integer part, [13:0] for fractional part

register.description: Control the Modulation Frequency (Fm) for Spread Spectrum. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Set the Exponent component of MODFREQDIV factor
Set the Mantissa component of MODFREQDIV factor

register.description: Control MPU PLL BYPASS clock. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Select the DPLL MPU bypass clock

bitenum.description: DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 1, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 2
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 4
DPLL_MPU bypass clock is CORE_X2_CLK divided by 8

DRIFTGUARD feature is enabled

register.description: This register provides controls over the DPLL.

bitfield.description: Allows control of the BYPASS clock of the PLL and the associated HSDIVIDER. In DPLL Locked mode, 0 - No impact 1 - No impact In DPLL Bypass mode, 0 - CLKINP is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2 1 - CLKINPULOW is selected as the BYPASS clock for CLKOUT/CLKOUTX2

DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). Equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M). [warm reset insensitive]
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) (equal to input N of DPLL; actual division factor is N+1). [warm reset insensitive]

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT1 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT1 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H11+1) post-divider factor (1 to 63).

bitenum.description: 2, to be used for OPP_OD
5, to be used for OPP_NOM
10, to be used for OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the CLKOUT2 o/p of the HSDIVIDER1.

bitfield.description: HSDIVIDER1 CLKOUT2 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL (H12+1) post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 2, to be used for OPP_OD
6, to be used for OPP_NOM
12, to be used for OPP_LOW

bitfield.description: Only CLKINPULOW bypass clock supported for this PLL
Duty-cycle corrector for high frequency clock Read 0: Duty-cycle corrector is disabled
DPLL multiplier factor (2 to 2047). Equal to input M of DPLL; M=2 to 2047 = DPLL multiplies by M [warm reset insensitive]
DPLL divider factor (0 to 127) Equal to input N of DPLL, actual division factor is N+1. [warm reset insensitive]

register.description: This register provides controls over the M2 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUTX2 status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUT status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL M2 post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 1, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

register.description: This register provides controls over the M3 divider of the DPLL.

bitfield.description: DPLL CLKOUTHIF status

bitenum.description: The clock output is gated
The clock output is enabled

bitfield.description: DPLL M3 post-divider factor (1 to 31).

bitenum.description: 1, to be used for both OPP_NOM and OPP_LOW

register.description: Control the DeltaMStep parameter for Spread Spectrum Clocking. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: DeltaMStep is split into fractional and integer part. For Triangular Spread Spectrum: [19:18] for integer part, [17:0] for fractional part For Square Wave Spread Spectrum [19:14] for integer part, [13:0] for fractional part

register.description: Control the Modulation Frequency (Fm) for Spread Spectrum. [warm reset insensitive]

bitfield.description: Set the Exponent component of MODFREQDIV factor
Set the Mantissa component of MODFREQDIV factor

register.description: Shadow register to program new DPLL configuration affecting EMIF and GPMC (L3 clock) functional frequency during DVFS. The PRCM HW automatically applies the new configuration after EMIF/GPMC have been put in idle state.

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DIV_M2_DPLL_CORE[4:0] DIVHS. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to '1'. Divide value from 1 to 31.
Shadow register forCM_CLKMODE_DPLL_CORE[2:0] DPLL_EN. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to '1'.

bitenum.description: Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Low Power mode.
Put the DPLL in Idle Bypass Fast Relock mode.
Enables the DPLL in Lock mode

bitfield.description: Specify if DLL should be reset or not during the frequency change hardware sequence.

bitenum.description: DLL is not reset during the frequency change hardware sequence
DLL is reset automatically during the frequency change hardware sequence

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DLL_CTRL[0] DLL_OVERRIDE. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after EMIF IDLE if the FREQ_UPDATE field is set to '1'.

bitenum.description: Lock and code outputs are not overriden
Lock output is overriden to '1' and code output is overriden with a value coming from control module.

bitfield.description: Writing '1' indicates that a new configuration is available. It is automatically cleared by HW after the configuration has been applied.

register.description: Shadow register to program new DPLL configuration affecting GPMC (L3 clock) functional frequency during DVFS. The PRCM HW automatically applies the new configuration after EMIF/GPMC have been put in idle state.

bitfield.description: Shadow register forCM_DIV_H12_DPLL_CORE[5:0] DIVHS. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after GPMC IDLE if the CM_SHADOW_FREQ_CONFIG1[0] FREQ_UPDATE field is set to '1' and GPMC_FREQ_UPDATE is set to '1'. Divide value from 1 to 31.

Shadow register forCM_CLKSEL_CORE[4] CLKSEL_L3. The main register is automatically loaded with the shadow register value after GPMC IDLE if the CM_SHADOW_FREQ_CONFIG1[0] FREQ_UPDATE field is set to '1' and GPMC_FREQ_UPDATE is set to '1'.

bitenum.description: L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 1
L3_CLK is CORE_CLK divided by 2

bitfield.description: Controls whether or not GPMC has to be put automatically into idle during the frequency change operation.

bitenum.description: GPMC is not put automatically into idle during frequency change operation.
GPMC is put automatically into idle during frequency change operation.

register.description: Control the time unit of the sliding window for dynamic dependencies (auto-sleep feature).

bitfield.description: Time unit is equal to (PRESCAL + 1) L4 clock cycles.
